creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cover for album; brocade fabric with wood edges
dimension: H.11-11/16 x W.15-3/8 x D.1-3/8 in. (album, closed)
markings: label, on front of album, with untranslated inscriptions, two seals and \'Kao Chieh 1\', in pencil, \'C4\', in black ink and \'57\', in blue ink, at bottom of label
title: Cover for Finger Painting Album
